description: Marks an entity actively biting another entity's neck, occupying the mouth and preventing conflicting mouth-based or proximity actions.

bitten_entity_id.description: The ID of the entity whose neck is being bitten

initiated.description: Whether this entity initiated the neck bite interaction

consented.description: Whether the bitten entity has consented to remain in the bite

activityMetadata.description: Inline metadata for activity description generation. Allows this component to define how it should be described in activity summaries without requiring a separate metadata component.

shouldDescribeInActivity.description: Whether this component should be included in activity descriptions. Set to false to hide from activity summaries.

template.description: Template string with placeholders: {actor} for the entity with this component, {target} for the entity referenced by targetRole property

targetRole.description: Property name in this component's data containing the target entity ID. Defaults to 'bitten_entity_id' for the entity whose neck is being bitten.

priority.description: Display priority for activity ordering. Higher values appear first. Range: 0-100. High priority (73) for active intimate and dramatic interaction.
